content: the pattern is designed for 72 stitches and a size 39-40 eu i knitted with 2 0 mm needles in the pattern you ll find all steps for knitting the sporty cuff with a heel tab i ll explain how to do a provisional cast-on with waste yarn knit short row and join the provisional cast-on edge with the main row instructions for knitting and shaping a reinforced heel a simple stitch pattern for the sock front and how to integrate the arch support section we ll also knit a wedge toe and close it with the kitchener stitch all of this is supported by detailed videos in two parts links to the videos are included in the guide
